overview: • Senior Brand Manager Heineken Puerto Rico, largest single distributor market globally, surpassed revenue target USD 180 million+, increased all brand indicators Heineken brand. • Managing Director Engage Advertising Agency, youth & entertainment marketing, Puerto Rico, managed to grow revenue 300% in year 2 to USD 1 million USD. • Marketing Director Heineken in (Dutch) Caribbean turned around all brand indicators and sales for the Amstel brand following years of consequent decline, developed Heineken Young Consumer strategy, which is still used in the market today.
